BEcome a member

Established in 1984, the Cartoon Art Museum is a nonprofit educational museum dedicated to the history of cartoon art. View our exhibitions, meet and mingle with real cartoonists, and gain inspiration to create your own cartoons!

 
I Want to Become a Member

This business is #OpenToAll. We believe that when businesses open their doors to the public, they should be Open to All. We took the pledge to reject discrimination! www.opentoall.com

 

San Francisco Museums For All

The Cartoon Art Museum is a proud participant in San Francisco Museums For All, a program that provides low-income residents with free or reduced admission to local museums and cultural centers.

EBT, SNAP & MediCal cardholders receive free admission for up to 4 people per visit.

Visit: https://www.sfhsa.org/san-francisco-museums-all for more info.
